review:
The Best ! Amazing and perfect for me! I was introduced to meditation in a class setting and loved it.  Unfortunately the instructor moved, and no class.   After open heart surgery and and a stroke 3 years ago, I search the App Store for a meditation app that would work for me, HEADSPACE is it, worth every penny!  I really love the new features, the Wake Up and the Move section.  
 As I am over 70, I would like to see specific courses directed towards ‚Äú older‚Äú people.  Thanks
title: Truly love it !

review: I been going through really bad panic attacks and depression to the point it seriously affected my life. After looking through all the different meditations apps I settled on this one. I have tried different ones but one doesn‚Äôt compare to Headspace. Its the best because it  guides you through mediation. I now think and feel different about my life. I highly really recommend  it changes your way of thinking.
title: Life changing

review:
I‚Äôve tried so many times over the years to learn how to meditate, but no one has been able to explain it so that it made sense - until Andy. It‚Äôs silly, right? Meditation is such a simple concept, but people like to make it complicated. All it takes is understanding a few simple concepts and then consistency in practice. 

Grateful for Headspace and the ability to work with my mind and body in concert!
title: So THIS is what it feels like to meditate

review: Of all the apps I have on my phone, Headspace is the best! It has made my meditation practice consistent (I‚Äôm on a 200 day streak), and it has helped me change my mindset in so many positive ways. There are so many wonderful features in addition to meditation sessions (focus music, the wake up, mindful moments, etc) that I use everyday. I also use the meditations for kids with my children. Best app! It‚Äôs really helped me stay sane and healthy during Covid.
title: Best app ever

review: I‚Äôve been enjoying using the Headspace app for at least 17 days in a row... until today, when the app keeps buffering. I searched the app for app help, but there‚Äôs none to be found. I came here to the App Store and found an update, I updated, but still it is buffering. I went to the Headspace Facebook group, the FAQ freezes at a point saying Safari has to accept cookies (I already have Safari set properly). Headspace should be calming stress, not causing it.
title: Great, but where‚Äôs the support?
developerResponse: {'id': 22270643, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about the trouble with your app. Please send us a note to help@headspace.com so we can further assist. ", 'modified': '2021-04-16T00:11:43Z'}

review: I graduated this year and can‚Äôt find a job. And I cannot continue to work in the restaurant because of the pandemic. I thought I was ok until I start losing my sleep. I wonder more and more when will I be able to work and I decide to pick up meditation again. Thank you so much for the free subscription, when everything else crashes me, I get my little head space here :)
title: Just want to say thank you!!

review:
I would have given it a five star review, because it has helped me get to sleep multiple nights, if only for one problem. 

I'd signed up for the monthly subscription of $12 per month. Next thing I know when my trial is over, it's taking $75 out of my account because for some reason I'd been switched to the yearly subscription. I did not switch. I did not want nearly $100 of my savings to be taken. Now, I guess I have to use it until my subscription is up, or it'd just be a waste of money. 

Hopefully this hasn't happened to anyone else and I hope it won't happen in the future either.
title: Upset

review: As a single mom and full time teacher, this app has made my life different, better, more real and more valued. I bought a lifetime membership two years ago and have used it almost everyday since. Headspace has helped me through some of life‚Äôs most difficult challenges and made me a more present Mom, art teacher, friend and family member. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. ‚ù§Ô∏è
title: Headspace has changed my life

review: I am a highly sensitive person. I carefully manage what video and audio I ingest and I want to choose when. The updated app forces a video on me as soon as the app is opened. It's so distressing that I rarely use the app anymore. Moving images of any sort are inappropriate in this context *without my consent*. Please make these videos optional. I literally get stressed just clicking the orange app button knowing I have to go through this. I'm annoyed that this app change was made do soon after I payed the annual fee. Our brains are already too oriented to visual cues that reduce our subtle awareness. I just can't understand why you've chosen to do this.
title: Opening video is distressing

review: My 6 year old and I absolutely love the sleep music and sleepcasts. On my own time I‚Äôve started the basics course and I‚Äôm halfway through the first collectio, already I am noticing a difference. I sleep better and I‚Äôm more mindful. I saw ads for Headspace for awhile and always thought about it, now I wish I had gotten it sooner! I just paid for a year subscription and I can‚Äôt wait to see where this journey takes me! üôÇ
title: Great for sleep

review:
Headspace was the first app that introduced me to mindfulness meditation. Fast forward 6 years later, It‚Äôs still one of the best meditation apps out there and I still use it everyday. I started from doing it one a day for 10 min to twice a day for 20. It changed my life. 

One flaw I wish their product team will look into is having a timer feature for when you want to meditate on your own but would still like to get subtle nudges of the time in set intervals.
title: Great app

review:
I adore Headspace. I feel like it opened the door to mediation, and has had a genuine positive impact on my day-to-day mood. Having this kind of escape in my pocket has been so powerful. 

However‚Äîfor the high price point (almost $100 per year) its absolutely ridiculous to have my subscription and progress vanish from the app once a month, and then have to email back and forth 8 times over the course of weeks just to get it restored. I‚Äôm heartbroken to have to switch to Calm because of this massive error in the system.
title: Love it, but not worth getting your subscription erased.

review:
At first I was skeptical of meditation. Where would I find the time? How long do I have to sit still? But honestly it starts you off slow enough that you ease into and you find the time. Gradually you find more time and what‚Äôs the best time to meditate. 

I usually meditate every morning but sometimes, after a long day I meditate at night also. 

It‚Äôs really helping me guide myself to the person I want to become in 2021.
title: Love it

review: I‚Äôve used a couple of different meditation apps, but Headspace is my favorite. I like how they aren‚Äôt overly-philosophical or mystical in their approach to their meditation exercises. They keep it relatively simple and offer a variety of exercises and courses for different situations. I also really like the narrators‚Äô voices and styles. I‚Äôve used some of the Sleepcasts too; they‚Äôre nice, but the meditation exercises are the best part of the app and the most life-changing for me personally.
title: The best

review:
Maybe it‚Äôs the satisfying smooth graphics, or the lack of weird celebrity stories, but this app feels far more user friendly. I‚Äôve never been appreciative of every single feature and tab in an app until now. 

I‚Äôve always thought mindfulness was too simple and boring, but now I realize there are sooooo many ways to be more in-tune with my mind. I feel.... creative??? Headspace empowers me to independently build build out my mindfulness practice and routines. 

Finally, I REALLY appreciate the whole section on sleep. Ive procrastinated going to bed my entire life, but Headspace is changing that. I‚Äôve used the SOS feature, sound scapes, wind down stories, all of it. 

Thank you guys so so so so so so so much. This is an app I truly cannot live without.
title: Better than Calm

review: I received a year subscription through one of my migraine support organizations.  I‚Äôve tried several guided meditation apps and find that I have a hard time finding a voice that is easier to relax to and follow as many times the voices are either distracting to the practice or irritating.  I have thoroughly enjoyed the daily moments and the male voice has been perfect for me.  I am finding it easy to relax.
title: Impressed

review:
The interface is confusing and makes actually using the apps an endeavor in futility. I downloaded it to help me with my anxiety, but there weren‚Äôt any anxiety exercises I could find through the menus and even searched. Not sure what‚Äôs up with that.

Additionally, when I tried to cancel my subscriptions because I was very much not satisfied with my experience, I was given the run around and ultimately told there was nothing Headspace could do since I‚Äôm charged through Apple and not a credit card. 

Subscriptions are for a Year by default BTW. So yeah, not a great experience as a user or a consumer.
title: Not a great experience as a user or consumer

review: II really have enjoyed this app. I have other mental health and meditation apps, and this one is so quick and easy to use. I really enjoy the group everybody meditation. The graphics are fun and uplifting, the variety of material and supports provide me with anything I might need for a challenging moment. And I just discovered there are workouts as well. I will have to look into those. They seem perfect for travel! Highly recommend it.
title: Versatile and fun

review: Headspace is teaching me from the very beginning. I‚Äôm learning how to meditate but I also have a choice on how much time to spend on each session. My children listen to the sleepscapes at night and I listen to the ocean sounds during the day. There‚Äôs even mini workouts to help you connect mind and body. I love the choices you can make with a male or female voice depending on your mood or preferences.
title: Amazing for Beginners and more seasoned to meditation

review: The Headspace app has continued to evolve over the past few years without losing its simple, clear fundamentals. It's a great way to help maintain or develop a practice of meditation. I've started introducing my kids and they love their Andy time! Please add longer kids' sessions. They can handle it. And more variety for adults. I‚Äôm pretty tapped out on the main lessons after 9,000+ minutes.
title: Couldn't be better, but continues to get better

review: Although it‚Äôs beneficial to have a guided meditation, I feel it‚Äôs a waste of money and time to subscribe to this app. I admit it is positive to have a ‚Äú voice‚Äù guidance and making you sit down or walk around and try to meditate but I still think it‚Äôs not worth my money. Tell you the truth someone needs to give it a try for a couple of months maximum and even so I will get to the conclusion I don‚Äôt want to subscribe anymore
title: Repetitive

review: I have been loving using this app- just wish there was more! Although the sleepcasts are slightly different each night it would be nice to have more variants of rainy nights. Also, it would be nice to have the choice between narrator gender on each of the sleepcasts, similar to how they have the other mediations set up. This is all small potatoes long term. It‚Äôs a good app! Would recommend. Four stars because there‚Äôs room for growth!
title: Terrific for helping me get to sleep- would love more content

review: I see so many reviews for the app that say it‚Äôs wonderful and you can do almost everything without paying for it. So I downloaded the app expecting there to be reasonable free options to choose from, and guess what? It‚Äôs just like every other app that makes you buy premium and keeps everything under wraps so you can‚Äôt enjoy it without paying. There are only three or four free options tops, and it‚Äôs extremely limited. Very disappointed. The reviews are so fake I wonder if they are genuine people or just bots. Don‚Äôt get the app unless you want to pay for premium because there‚Äôs no point.
title: You can‚Äôt do anything without paying.

review: I recently went through the loss of a love one and I was left with a lot of emotional and mental pain, which impacted my health overall. Headspace has helped me with controlling the stress I‚Äôve been dealing with the past two months and helped with my sleep too! I will say that it is a bit pricy, I am fortunate enough to have the two-month trial. Overall, though, it‚Äôs a great app for meditation and sleep, which it is advertised as.
title: Amazing!

review: I‚Äôve had this app for about a week so far, and I am enjoying it. I just wish things were more free, instead of having to get a free trial of Headspace Plus, or buying it. I get why not everything is free, but I think it would be better if there was one or two things that were free in everything you get for Headspace Plus. I feel like that would make my Headspace experience a lot better. Otherwise, I think it is a great app!
title: Great App, wish things were more free

review:
I have struggled with falling to sleep my whole life and have tried medication and melatonin and other options, but with my ADHD nothing has worked, except this app. I listen to a sleepcast every night and fall asleep before it‚Äôs even over! They are so relaxing and calming, and there are so many options to chose from (10/10 recommend getting the full version, it‚Äôs worth it) 
Thank you headspace !!
title: Insomnia

review: I don‚Äôt have cancer. I would like to point that out right away, but as I was scrolling down trying to find a course for stress (that I had to pay for) I found one that was called ‚ÄúDealing with Cancer‚Äù or something along those lines, the only problem is that it costs money! People with cancer already pay a lot of money for the chemotherapy and it‚Äôs not cheap. They should make courses about cancer free in my opinion because something like cancer is NOT cheap! That‚Äôs why this stupid app deserves 2 stars.
title: Making me pay for a course called, ‚ÄúDealing with Cancer‚Äù

review: I used to meditate years ago then life got in the way and I hadn‚Äôt done it for years.  I recently started to meditate now that I am retired.  I had mentioned to my daughter that I was meditating and she had said she had seen this program that she thought would be good Ford the family.  We got the family plan and it is now helping 3 generations of us!  It works for any level of knowledge.  Fantastic app!
title: Good for anyone who meditates or wants to learn

review:
When I am focused and intentional in my daily routine Headspace helps me start my day grounded.  Unfortunately from time to time I let life get in the way of my self-care. I‚Äôm still working on that so I always find my way back. 

The meditations are easy to follow while providing foundational principles and practices that resonate with me. In addition to the meditations there are many other life enhancing resources available in the Headspace app.
title: I Love Headspace

review: I‚Äôve recently been having a lot of trouble sleeping and I‚Äôve tried many things. This app is absolutely incredible, I‚Äôve tried it for a week and I‚Äôve been sleeping amazing and had no problems at all. If you have had trouble sleeping or just need to relieve stress from your day, use this app. Thank you for making this app, it‚Äôs helped me out so much in such a short amount of time
title: Absolutely Amazing

review:
Thank you for adding captions for deaf and hard of hearing people!!!!!!

Thank you for paying Dora Kamau hopefully lots of money and inviting her to record the courses: Basics 2, 3, Managing Anxiety, and maybe more I haven‚Äôt yet discovered and downloaded!!!

Her light shines bright and I‚Äôm thankful the universe has aligned so she could share her gifts through this app.  
‚Äî

Feedback:

Have y‚Äôall considered adding organization to the favorites section? Check out Spotify‚Äôs new library filtering material design. Right now it‚Äôs hard to parse my lessons, singles, & visualizations from just the thumbnail and name. 

I have the same request for the ‚ÄúCourses‚Äù tab. I wish to filter it by teacher availability (i.e. Does Dora yet teach this?)

Thank you
title: Added Closed Captioning! Added Dora Kamau to several new Courses

review: The app user experience is top notch- well organized, really aesthetically pleasing graphics and fun animations. LOVE all the guides, different focuses and the ability to sort through and choose a series or one off. Bedtime sleep casts are AMAZING! My daughter and I listen to one every night as she falls asleep. This has made incorporating meditation into my life so painless and joyful and it‚Äôs genuinely changing me for the better! Thank you Headspace!!! üíï
title: Awesome medication resource!!!!

review: Ive been using Headspace for quiet some bit and it had really changed and benefited me in such many positive ways-well I had a bit of a pause and lost tracks but when I came back to continue my journey to find out that most of the packs and sessions I used to use were all locked now. It‚Äôs just a bit too much for a person who is just trying to genuinely better themselves and having to pay with this type of pricing - Sorry-will try again when improved!
title: It was great until..

review:
I was doubtful to try Headspace at first, but my company has offered us a complimentary annual subscription to Headspace so I decided to give it a shot.

It‚Äôs been very difficult to find available appointments for therapy so I ventured to trying Headspace out of desperation. I have been exploring the different features such as listening to the calming soundscapes and I also just tried for the ‚ÄúReleasing the Wounds‚Äù meditation‚Äî Which was incredibly helpful and it motivated me to write this review.

Thank you for creating this wholesome platform. It has helped me from losing my mind to anxiety and I hope that it can continue to aid me in my journey of healing. 

I hope you know you are making a positive impact on people‚Äôs lives. Cheers to the new year!
title: A wonderful platform‚Äî Thank you!

review: I use this app for my daily meditation. This has definitely helped me to establish and maintain my practice. I do wish there was some more variety in the meditations; however. They all seem to share the same approach for every issue, for example, the meditation for self-esteem seems almost the same as the meditation for stress.i would like to see some other variations in the future, e.g., with music and more guidance.
title: Love This App

review:
It‚Äôs truly astonishing how well-designed and effective this app is. I always found excuses to avoid a meditation practice, but headspace makes it fun and almost addictive to sit down every day. The advice and directions in the guided sessions and courses are fantastic if you feel like you struggle to ‚Äúget it right‚Äù. 

I also really love the sleep content. I go to bed with sleepcasts every night and they helped me get over a bout of heavy insomnia.
title: Phenomenal app

review: I do like this app, and think that for other people, it helps in the best ways. But unfortunately, it didn‚Äôt help me as much as I needed it to. It‚Äôs not the app‚Äôs fault, it‚Äôs my own fault. However, i only used the app for one night so far, it didn‚Äôt make me fall asleep, but it definitely helped in the best of ways. I hope this app does more for others to help with stress, health, falling asleep, staying asleep, and much more.
title: I love this app

review: The only issue I have with this app is a technical one. I like to stream either the sound, or both sound and video, to airplay devices like Apple TV or my Sonos speaker. But when I use the iOS swipe up feature and try to use the interface there to send audio to my Sonos via Airplay, sometimes whole segments of the meditation or the soundscape is just missing. Full support built into the app for Airplay would make a huge difference.
title: Needs full airplay support

review: Stressful moments have always been very present in my life, from school to work or friendships, etc. This app has transformed the way I think and view my thinking, and is always there when I need a moment of peace. Whenever I feel myself becoming too overwhelmed, I open Headspace. The app has become part of my daily routine. The meditations are simple yet so effective for me. Worth every penny :)
title: most life-changing app

review: AWESOME app!!! I would highly recommend both the unpaid and paid version. The paid version is just too expensive on top of all the other bills I have to pay :/ this should be like 5.99... especially for broke people who just need help falling asleep or relaxing/meditating or for college students like myself. I also wish there were more options, especially for sleep when I‚Äôm paying over $10/mo but apart from that, great app :)
title: Great but expensive

review: That‚Äôs a bold statement to make, but the knowledge I‚Äôve gained from actually learning how to meditate and apply it to my everyday life has been invaluable. I‚Äôd highly recommend this app for anyone looking to better understand how to meditate and to utilize it to address depression, anxiety, worrying, fear, or any other number of issues we all deal with each and every day.
title: The App that changed my life

review: I really really don‚Äôt like being told what to do by privileged clinicians. So it‚Äôs nice to still have access to helpful resources. There‚Äôs a lot of life skills this app can help with. My work pays for it idk if I would pay for it myself. The voices and advice aren‚Äôt too pushy. A little bit uppity but at least not pushy. no matter what your background everyone wants more control in their life learning to work with yourself is how to get real control
title: Don‚Äôt like being told what to do

review:
I have turned off all notifications in settings except for a daily meditation reminder. But every day I get notifications pushing Move Mode which I have zero interest in.

Is the only way to opt out of your marketing spam to turn notifications off entirely? Because if so, I don‚Äôt think I have any use for this app. Isn‚Äôt the point of subscription models to be FREE from harassment?

This is dishonest behavior, and making me reconsider my subscription.

Edit: sent a messge to support as suggested. Been a week and no response, probably because the answer is, sorry you can‚Äôt just get a simple daily meditation reminder, we‚Äôll stuff our extra marketing down your throat no matter what. Canceled my subscription, deleted the app, downloaded Insight Timer instead.

Yet another vampire app trying to deceive you into giving it every moment of your waking life, to justify subscribing to endless variations of the same meditation script.
title: Harassing notifications
developerResponse: {'id': 22058878, 'body': 'Sorry about the trouble with the notifications you are receiving. Please send us a note to help@headspace.com so we can further assist you.', 'modified': '2021-04-05T22:30:48Z'}

review: I got this on recommendation from a friend. I have been suffering with anxiety induced insomnia for years now. Sometimes it‚Äôs getting to sleep and sometimes it‚Äôs waking in the night and not being able to go back to sleep. The sleep casts and sleep radio have become my friend and I drift off peacefully now every night and have been a lot more rested. A HUGE THANK YOU for this wonderful app.
title: This Works, Helps Me Sleep Finally

review: This is one app that I have purchased and have actually use everyday. The music, meditation and even the move offers a wide variety of ways to open the mind, and calm the soul with out making you feel like it was wasted time 5 minutes later. I take the teachings with me through out the day to keep me aware but nonjudgmental. I truly appreciate this form of instruction guidance.
title: Worth every penny

review:
I tried the one week free trial and was not informed properly that it ended until the day after. Ended up wasting $75 for a years subscription with no way of recalling it. My email was given but I was not sent a notice or reminded at any point. Might be a fault of mine and I was even considering the monthly subscription.
 
Edit.
They have great customer support and helped the best they can.
title: Had a problem

review: Everything from the design to the program itself is so well-made, it‚Äôs a pleasure to use. Also, thank you for offering the unemployment deal to my spouse during this pandemic. It made the decision affordable for us both, and is helping us deal with the situation with more clarity.
title: Tremendous app

review:

review: I love this app and it‚Äôs very useful, but i wish that there were more options for non premium users. I was thinking that maybe for the sleepcasts, the four free options could rotate each week so that users can get a variety of things without having them all available at once. I think that there should at least be one free yoga lesson as well because not everyone can afford paying that high of a price for the subscription.
title: great!

review:
When I‚Äôm listening to some of the nighttime stories the future is mentioned and even though I know it is irrational to think about 10,000 years into the future it still makes worry that I‚Äôm not going To be here. Thank You, 
Keep up the good work
title: Things that make me think about the future

review: This app is so awesome i have felt so much more at peace! My favorite is the rain day  antiques sleep sound! The only thing would be is that there is so many things you have to pay for! People please for the people who can‚Äôt afford it make more things free!! Overall so great app! Totally recommended to a stressed out person don‚Äôt matter what age! title: Omg awesome!!!

review: The best way I could describe what I‚Äôm feeling just after my first session is peace, I had woken up in not the best mood, feeling groggy and aggressive towards any thoughts. I would try to fight them back as I have mental health issues but they always seem to come back to battle me. Then after this session they sort of just left my mind for even just a few seconds and those seconds felt great ‚ù§Ô∏è
title: Feeling at peace

review: Learning to quiet your mind is incredible useful for stopping the momentum behind and negative thought patterns. By using a 15 minute meditation each morning, I‚Äôve been able to re-direct those reactionary thoughts we all get, and train my mind to focus on thoughts that serve me. Paired with the Law of Attraction teachings, you can learn to manifest anything you want, using the power (and pleasure) of your thoughts backed by positive emotion.
title: Headspace changed my life

review: Being 12 years old, I try to make a habit of meditating. Headspace is a great way for beginning and more experience people to get a quick moment of calm in there day before the business. The sessions range from long to short and even include some kid ones, although I would probably not recommend those for anyone above 8. Headspace is a very beneficial app and I would recommend it.
title: So relaxing!

review: I used this app for a long time. The foundation was great so I bought it and I love everything they have for sleep. It really helped me get over my insomnia. However, I lot of the programs are EXTREMELY similar and it begins to feel repetitive. That‚Äôs fine for just a meditation practice, I get that meditation alone leads to a lot of mental health benefits, but I was looking for the more specific help that each package claimed to help with but it felt like I was just getting more of the same.
title: Pretty Good

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for more than a year but since the chaos started last year I‚Äôve been really looking for ways to help reduce my anxiety, keep focused while working from home and sleep better.  I can‚Äôt say I use headspace every single day but on the days I do, I feel better!  Love the newer additions of the daily plan, focus playlists and even exercises.
title: One year in, still love headspace!

review: As someone who suffers from anxiety and depression, Headspace has helped me through dealing with many difficult situations when they flare up. The courses are great to learn different techniques and methods to cope, and I love the feature that sets up a schedule for you each day with activities to meditate and reflect. The sleep section is amazing, and I use their sleep casts every night to sleep. I highly recommend Headspace!
title: Wonderful!

review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace for about 2 years and it‚Äôs been so helpful in centering me in my life. But when I was diagnosed with stage 4 throat cancer last fall, the anxiety pack and cancer pack were enormously helpful in getting me through some really tough times! I was so much more calm, reflective and less anxious throughout my treatments. I can‚Äôt imagine having gone through that without Headspace. ‚ò∫Ô∏è
title: Helped with my cancer diagnosis

review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace for a few months to help me fall asleep & stay asleep. I love the abundance of topics, as well as the fact that you can do a single meditation or do a course over 10 session. I have completed a few courses & practice the techniques when I‚Äôm stressed or anxious. I haven‚Äôt explored all aspects of the app, there‚Äôs so much offered. This is a keeper. I recommended the app to friends & family. It helps!

review: Honestly, this is the best app for meditation. It‚Äôs easy to use and has many aspects to choose from. Along with exercise, this is a daily routine I‚Äôve added to achieve a healthy lifestyle. Headspace has been more important in this past year during these crazy pandemic/quarantine times.  I used to use the app sporadically but now it has become a welcome routine that has kept my sanity! I highly recommend.

review: I can‚Äôt explain how much and in how ways Headspace has changed the way I feel and react to many situations in my life.  I only have one small concern. Other than that Headspace has all I need to become a better person!

review: I‚Äôve made a decision this year that if I‚Äôm feeling a need for a ‚Äúdistraction‚Äù or ‚Äúquick phone check‚Äù I turn it into a 2 min meditation or look at some of the video content on this app rather than mindlessly looking through socials. Thank you Headspace team for the fresh content, the tried & true meditations & the beautiful sleep sounds. I utilize all three of these very often. üåà

I think it would be great if you could sort by voice, background noise, etc. overall a great app and I use it to sleep every night!

review:
I use this app 3 times a day. I do a morning stretch Move exercise when I wake up, and another higher intensity Move workout after the day is over, and I fall asleep to a sleep cast every night. This app has truly become an integral part of my life, and has made me feel so much better. 

It has completely helped me reframe anxiety and stress and I can‚Äôt be thankful enough. Thank you headspace!
title: Life changing

review: I like the idea of this app but the jarring color scheme and cartoonish graphics are kind of cringe - not a relaxing, zen-like space at all. I tried the meditation timer and I found the sound to be very poor quality and not something I‚Äôd want to use as a meditation tool. There‚Äôs also not much customization if I want to set a timer for a specific duration or want to adjust the type of sound I hear. The quality of the gong sound is surprisingly quite irritating. I prefer an app to be aesthetically pleasing so that I will want to use it every day. I will stick to the Calm app.
title: Aesthetically Unappealing

review: Not only is the interface and usability terrible (can‚Äôt find things, I download things for offline that get deleted), but the last straw is when I went to cancel my auto renewal for their annual subscription and they have the balls to not have any unsubscribe button available! It says to email them to unsubscribe but then I don‚Äôt get a response for over 4 days and counting. Soon my subscription auto renewal date will arrive and I‚Äôll have to call my credit card company. And what if I emailed them with a day to go to cancel? This company is clearly a mess and needs to be better run.
title: No way to cancel subscription easily!!!

review:
I‚Äôve been using Insight Timer almost nightly, and I actually enjoy it a lot. It runs the gamut w choices from guided meditations to soundscapes etc... You can filter w a ton of options, like outcome desired, voice tone, with or w out music, length, and a lot more. 

However, I kept seeing this advertised, so I decided I‚Äôd check it out. In less than 10 mins I saw a sad excuse for an app promising calm! After reading reviews, I believe they‚Äôre stealing you blind to pay for advertising, not your relaxation!

I‚Äôm shocked how primitive it is, compared to many similar apps I‚Äôve tried. You can't filter, and you can‚Äôt fast forward or rewind. The meditations are all short, w the same voice, and the graphics look like a child's game. 

If you‚Äôre looking to unwind and/or ascend the ladder of skill, this isn‚Äôt it. I‚Äôve tried many apps in this category, and I‚Äôm more resolute I‚Äôll stay w Insight Timer and stop comparison shopping!

review: Headspace has a nice interface and great content about meditation. I love the way by giving you an intro about the essence of meditation first for most of the session, so letting me to understand more about life and meditation. Love the variety, focus, happiness, sleep etc. and the group meditation session. Meditation needs practice. I start feeling of the benefit of it to my work and my life.
title: Great meditation app with many varieties

review: As someone who does struggle with anxiety/depression, this app does help me manage and control my stress and attacks. I use it when I go to sleep and when I‚Äôm overworked at work and life. It helps calm me down and focus on improvement and being overall happier. I would recommend this to everyone, to give it a shot and try it out.
title: It is worth the time and the investment.

review: Recently I‚Äôve been having a lot of stress and didn‚Äôt know how to handle it, I‚Äôve also been having trouble with unhealthy habits I‚Äôve been having. When I saw an ad for this app and see if could help me, it has changed my life for the better, I‚Äôve only done 3 sessions and I‚Äôm already feeling so much better than before.üòå
title: This app is amazing

review: Headspace is incredible! I‚Äôm an engineer so I have always been skeptical of the mind how people who believe in things like manifestation might have been crazy. BUT they aren‚Äôt! Every time I do a meditation I figure out something new about myself, or it helps me uncover a solution to problem that had been concerning me. Trust in yourself and in your mind, you are powerful!
title: Amazing App!

review:
I‚Äôve had chronic insomnia for many years and tried the sleepcasts as a last resort. I was pleasantly surprised and very happy to find that most nights I am asleep before the story ends.
Four stars because unfortunately I am now basically addicted to Eve‚Äôs voice and can only fall asleep to her stories. I‚Äôd love it if you could please provide an choice for male/female (Eve) voice selection like the mediations offer. 
Thank you!!
title: Fantastic for my insomnia

review: I have been using this app Headspace for a number of years. I observed myself a noticeable difference on mornings that I do not take time to sit. This app helps me set a positive tone in which to begin my day openly and with calmness. I am a 64-year-old high school special education teacher. It is imperative that I stay centered in my work. I am grateful for this app to help me make that happen.
title: Morning meditation

review: This app helped me start my journey on meditation. It made the initial resistance I had met away with it‚Äôs easy tradition and guided supervision. I feel like I am in the room with Andy when listening to the app. I am very grateful for this app and eagerly look forward to using it each morning. Absolutely superb! look forward to using it each morning. Absolutely superb!
title: New to meditation? yes.

review:
A lot of good quality guided meditations for all levels. New Focus tab is actually great, and I enjoy using it.

Would like to see AirPlay support, especially for Move section, because it‚Äôs a bit uncomfortable to look at a small screen for the instructions.

And missing dark mode, which right now is becoming a necessity.
title: Great app to start with meditation.

review: hi. i'm pretty young, high school age. i recently got diagnosed with major anxiety and depression, so i wanted to try something to help me cope with it. the first couple of basic courses were alright, but i had a hard time following it because i can't sit still for very long. however, i saw that in the library, there were things that can help whenever my anxiety or depression is really bothering me. but guess what? you have to subscribe to get most of it! i'm a kid, and i don't have a credit card. besides, my parents wouldn't pay that much for some meditation app. i always get sorta upset whenever these self care apps make the actually helpful things premium features that you have to buy. i shouldn't have to buy peace of mind.
title: pricey

review: I love Headspace. I am a psychotherapist and I came across headspace during my practice as a means to help teach my clients the art of mindfulness. I now use Headspace myself almost daily and frequently use it with clients in session and they choose to use on their own as well. I love the animations that teach/guide as well as all the different variations of practice. I highly recommend.
title: Highly recommend.

review: I struggle a lot with medical. I love music, so the music in the back helps me so much. They should add queen into this. It helps when I breathe üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. I like paying money for this because it‚Äôs worth it. I don‚Äôt like hospitals, but i Am always in them do this is awesome for me to chill out. Thank you for reading. please buy a red iPhone to support aids
title: Helps with My Auto emune deficiency and related health problems

review: It‚Äôs rare to find something self help like that truly works. This is worth all the time I can throw at it. My day to day life can be so much calmer because the time I take to meditate. I have had horrible anger issues for as long as I can remember and I actually feel them easing. I stopped yelling so much. Maybe soon I will begin to smile more.
title: Life changing and worth it.

review: I really like this app, it helps a lot with calming down, falling asleep and things like that. The only problem for me personally is that most of the sessions on anxiety are locked. I get anxiety at night so I was hoping this would help me but, considering most of the the anxiety ones ( that I saw at least) were locked I was a bit disappointed. Other than that though great app.
title: Okay but could improve

review:
Headspace is cool. Don‚Äôt get me wrong‚ÄîI love the idea and the concepts that it‚Äôs built around but the paywall is ridiculous. That‚Äôs my only problem with it. I‚Äôve deleted this app and redownloaded it multiple times in the past few years and every time I‚Äôve deleted‚Äîit‚Äôs because there is nothing to do.

Sure, there are four or five short meditations, sounds, and headspaces, but there is so much content unavailable to non-premium users. It‚Äôs annoying and the app is, essentially, useless unless you pay the expensive fee. As a minor going into highschool I don‚Äôt have the money or the time. 

If you‚Äôre considering getting this app, by all means, get it. Try the premium. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs helpful.

My only objection is the paywall. If that‚Äôs ever removed (or at least lessened, because I understand you need money) then maybe I‚Äôll consider this app again and boosting my review. 

Thank you for your time.
title: Do not recommend

review: I didn‚Äôt know how to meditate in a real way, which this app has easily guided me through, but it also helped me learn so many tricks that therapists have also taught me to deal with stress and anxiety throughout the day. It‚Äôs such a godsend and has focuses on so many things to help you improve your life. I love it, thank you for making this app!
title: Incredible- you will love it

review:
I work at home and live with a four year old 24/7. Add that single reality to many other surprisingly gruesome variables and you have my life. 

This app brought me back to the land of the trying-to-be-skillful-living and for that, I give it four stars. 

The fifth star is for the delicious fact that the sound of Andy‚Äôs voice puts my daughter to sleep like a shot.
title: Unearthed By Headspace

review: My husband and I began our Headspace journey shortly after we retired. Now 18 months later,  it‚Äôs an essential part of how we start our day. We would never have predicted how the global pandemic would change our lives but amid the challenges is consistent peaceful grounding that begins our day. Thank you, Andy for offering Headspace!
title: Daily practice: a year and a half later

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for almost 3 years after looking for something to help me deal with my anxiety. Andy‚Äôs soothing voice and tips on meditating/breathing/relaxing have helped me even when I‚Äôm not meditating. I recently updated the app and the new version cuts Andy off at the end. I hope the developers fix this with the next version.
title: Best Meditation App Out There

review: I used the free app for a few months and saw a difference but can I say how much I commend this company for positively impacting victims of unemployment in such an amazing and insightful way? What an amazing company for putting individuals mental health over profits and giving the app away for free if you are unemployed. What an amazing way to give back to the community, keep doing great things Headspace, I love you ‚ù§Ô∏è
title: What an amazing app and company

review:
I love HeadSpace! It really helps me calm down every night, and my sleep has improved tremendously! I just wish there were more ASMR sleepcasts! Out of all of them, there are only 2. Personally, I find that ASMR helps me fall asleep the best, but I practically know all the ASMR sleepcasts word for word now! I also wish the ASMR sleepcasts had more binaural sounds to drift off to.

I love this app though, I can barely make it through a full episode without falling asleep :)
title: Awesome! More AMSR!

review: I‚Äôve been trying to mediate for years without building the habit and within weeks of getting this app it‚Äôs changed my life. title: Expensive- people who need it and can‚Äôt afford it.

review:
I am fully enjoying headspace and the fact that it is offered at no fees makes it even better. Thank you.

title: New to this.

review:
Have found this app to be effective in calming and settling.  The format works into my schedule and gives me the freedom to adjust when and where to access the site.  
Understanding does help to improve adequately dealing with anxiety.  The lessons, in order build a familiarity with how the program works.  It is easier each time upon returning.

review:
About 2 years now, many forward steps , many standing still.  Offers a full & ever expanding menu - though lately have felt it‚Äôs too much.  Too many choices trying to match everyone‚Äôs need & tastes.  Perhaps  a smaller window is best for the scattered unsettled mind, especially during this unsettled worldwide pandemic.

Still after a while the message of stillness lingers.  Breathe - saunter away - breathe.

Just breathe.
title: Headspace

title: App Usage

The analogies they use put everything into a different perspective and truly help me. I could never thank this app enough for the support it has given me. 10/10.
title: Headspace

review: I wasn‚Äôt able to access silent meditation as a personal practice until finding this app, and it‚Äôs so much more than just that. Every phone should come with this pre-downloaded, it has something for everyone. Definitely worth the yearly subscription price for access to all content!
title: The best meditation-and-more app
developerResponse: {'id': 15661712, 'body': "So sorry for any trouble! Please send our team a note at help@headspace.com and we'd be more than happy to look into this for you.", 'modified': '2020-05-30T00:46:35Z'}

review:
A decent and general all around app but is missing some features.... 
No deep sleep or hypnosis that many popular sleep and meditation apps have like Breethe. 

Also lacks the ability to Chromecast or push any of the workout videos to TV streaming devices from phone. This is a pretty standard video feature these days and it was surprising that an app as popular as this doesn't have support for casting to screen.
title: Ok start but missing some options

review:
I was recommended Headspace by my physical therapist. It came from a casual conversation, and when I gave it a try, it resolved the tension around my neck that drove me to go to physical therapy in the first place.

Ever since, I went on and off this app until one day, the tension around the neck returned to the degree that I had experienced earlier on.

I quickly took up Headspace once more, and it has since been a daily tool for me to let go of tension, and return to the present.

I cannot thank Andy and the team enough for the courses that changed the subjective experience of my life.

Whether you are tense or fine but curious, I recommend a try to see how you feel.
title: Lifelong practice

review: I have been very overwhelmed lately with work and Headspace have helped me so much to wind down!! Taking a couple minutes off to meditate everyday in between my work is my new hobby!! Much more energy, much more relaxed! It helps immediately! And the fact that there is a meditation to every situation or emotion you might have is priceless! ‚ú® Thank you Headspace!
title: I love Headspace!!!

review:
I have been a headspace user for five years now, I wanted to connect it to Apple health to have some analysis of data. The instructions to integrate are to delete the app, remove all associated data, start from scratch, listen to the day 1, and then accept the Apple health integration.

I will update to 5 stars when they have a better workflow.
title: Unacceptable integration to Apple health

review:

title: Life changing

At this point, I prefer to do thePro offerings, but I love to intersperse other themed meditation series to give more variety and motivation for my practice.
title: Headspace for a clinical therapist

review: In-app purchase is so pricey so I tryna find a student discount from their website on google. They have it! I‚Äôm literally sooo happy and I paid subscription immediately! title: Headspace

review:
I highly recommend this app for anyone seeking balance. There is always so much going on in our heads, in the world, and just in general. This is a great tool to compartmentalize everything and keep you connected to your reality. 

It helps me start my day, think of new insights, take a break from a stressful moment, use focus music to keep centered in order to not get distracted, and be able to enjoy a peaceful human experience. 

Life isn‚Äôt easy but the guided meditation combined with the many other things this app offers helps you keep perspective through the good and bad of life. 

I love Headspace and can‚Äôt imagine my life without it.
title: The most used app on my phone.

review: I can‚Äôt even begin to say how great headspace is. It‚Äôs one of the best guided oracrices and it‚Äôs honestly changed my life. I have less anxiety more peace and feel f so much happier. NYC
title: Why I use Headspace

I usually have horrible insomnia and need medication to sleep which I hate taking because it makes me feel groggy the next day but wow! For sure will be using this nightly!
title: Wow!

review:
The app was great when it first came out. I‚Äôve been using it for at least 5-6 years. It was simple in those days. You open the app and your next session was right on the front. Today, the app is a cluttered mess. 

Year after year they add more and more features. I feel that they gone with a philosophy of ‚Äúmore‚Äù rather than ‚Äúdeeper‚Äù ‚Äî quantity over quality. 

In one word, the app is overwhelming.
title: Overwhelming and cluttered app

review:
I loved this app from the start, it has helped me so much.  There is so much variety as well, so many different meditations to choose from it‚Äôs unbelievable.  I‚Äôve tried other apps and this one beats them all hands down.  The sleep meditation are awesome to, they always put me out quickly.

title: Best meditation app!!

I‚Äôve spent a couple years testing meditation apps, this is far and away the best I‚Äôve ever used.

title: The perfect meditation app exists, and this it it.

review:
Headspace has helped me develop and maintain my meditation practice, leading me to numerous benefits and I couldn‚Äôt be more satisfied.

One feature request I would love to see would be a Sonos integration. Competing meditation applications have it, and it would be really nice if Headspace did as well.
title: Very good

I can‚Äôt say enough about this app! Love it! Worth every penny to pay for it.
title: Great App!

review: Headspace offered free meditation to healthcare providers through 2020, and I‚Äôve been really grateful! It‚Äôs helped with some of the racing thoughts and worrying as my entire routine has been turned upside down as my hospital prepares for COVID19. And it has helped me be more thankful for what I do have and for things I can control in my life. Thank you!

review: ...on the home screen.  I truly love this app and the soothing animations it has.  However, the recent addition of a video on the home screen with a watch button option makes it feel like I'm being shown a commercial.  Instead of soothing illustrations and animations, I'm greeted with a jarring and annoying video.  It's not conducive to relaxing meditation at all.  Thanks for your time.
title: Please eliminate video....

review: One of the single greatest things I have ever started for myself, my relationship with God, marriage, family, career and life in general. I only wish I would have started this earlier in life. Not always pretty or perfect. Sometimes you fall off the wagon and become inconsistent but it will never go away and will stay in your life forever.
title: A pillar in my life

review: I have no words for how much Headspace has helped me deepen my Meditation practice on all levels. It has helped me be more creative abs productive at work, sleep better, reduce body tension and pain, and simply love life and other people more. Thanks to the Headspace team for everything. You change the world by changing yourself! üíñ
title: Everyone needs this app.

review: Top-notch app. It feels like a high quality experience, with fun illustrations. The library is impressive with lots of good content. One minor gripe I have with the iPad app is that I‚Äôd love to be able to use it in landscape view. I use my iPad in landscape all the time and it‚Äôs a hassle to rotate it just for this app. Otherwise, the app is a pretty flawless experience.
title: Good stuff

review: Now Imma tell you this this thing WORK cause I really trying to get more energy when I go to sleep cause I always stay up all night and barely get any sleep and this help me so well I didn‚Äôt subscribe but I rather listen to the two things over and over again I prefer you get this right now before it‚Äôs too late.
title: BUY RIGHT NOW

review: I spent a lot of money on a Mindfulness class in 2013. It was a horrible experience and I gave up on meditation. In 2018 I found Headspace and it change my life. I am able to deal with so many situations differently now. It allows me to witness my thoughts and emotions without judging them and has helped me observe instead of acting on my emotions

review: Anytime I feel anxious or overwhelmed this is my go-to to ensure I start my day off on the right foot. review: I started using headspace as a way to de-stress during nursing school 3 years ago and it changed my life. Today even when  I get lost in a busy day there gentle reminder help me to take a break for myself and listen to my body, about what it feels.

That said (and I bet you knew that was coming) the website design is convulsed and terribly challenging to transverse- simply finding their available catalog  requires effort that will quickly bring you out of that relaxed state-of-mind, the one  motivated you to begin a search for yet more mental refreshment.

review: My only hiccups are the fact that I must stop listening to search for my next option and the dead noise when silent, I would love the option to have background sound, if possible. Otherwise, content is incredible and extremely useful for any situation. Keep up the good work over there and thank you!
title: Thoroughly enjoying my trial, expect to subscribe

review: If your deciding to find an app to calm yourself down from stress or anger, use headspace to clear those problems, if we could have everything free, it would be perfect, but still, it includes a good amount of things to do if you are not subscribed to their app, so just download the app, and let headspace clear your mind from anger.
title: A Good And Relaxing App

review:
5 stars for everything. Love the app, love the sleep features. Happy to pay for it. Give everyone a raise and a weighted blanket. 

-1 star because I‚Äôd really like to be able to cast audio (to a Google Home, for example) rather than playing it through Bluetooth. Since bluetooth won‚Äôt support playing audio through multiple speakers at once.  

Any chance that‚Äôs in the works?
title: Great app, but ...

review: Thank you Headspace, for making your incredible resources available to teachers for free. I would never be able to afford it otherwise. I use Headspace all the time with my students, who suffer from trauma and have difficult home-lives. I use it all the time for myself as well, as part of my self-care routine.
title: Thank you

review: Since social distancing and working from home - I really appreciate ‚Äúthe wake up.‚Äù I would normally grab my phone first thing in the morning and struggle with avoiding the spirals of distraction. Now I wake up with headspace, put my phone down after and it‚Äôs even easier for me to stay mindful about my tasks throughout the day.
title: Great updates!!

review: I love this app and it helps me fall asleep, but I don‚Äôt want to make my parents pay money every month, it‚Äôs too expensive!!! This app could help so many people!!! And I love it so much but I can‚Äôt listen to ones that will help me sleep better because they‚Äôre all locked! :( I would do anything for more too be free instead of a couple because it would be helpful for everyoneü•∫
title: It‚Äôs so good!! but...

review:
I really regret wasting $70 on the Headspace app. I‚Äôve moved on to ‚ÄúUnplug‚Äù and ‚ÄúInsight Timer‚Äù both superior in terms of functionality and content. These are my main beefs:

1) Headspace still doesn‚Äôt work in landscape mode on the iPad. It‚Äôs 2020, come on. Lots of folks have an iPad propped landscape mode next to them in bed at night. It‚Äôs very cumbersome and not conducive to relaxation or sleep to keep rotating your iPad, or your head.

2) For advanced meditators there is no way to search by time for 40 minute or longer meditations.

3) The customer support is appalling. They don‚Äôt respond during your free trial. And once you‚Äôve paid their responses are dismissive and curt, at least this was my experience when I tried to find out when the app will work in landscape mode. Both the apps I mention above DO work just great in landscape mode.
title: App not worth the money for several reasons

review: I have been using headspace for over 5 years and it has helped me through so many things like stress, anxiety, control issues, pregnancy. I sleep better, I work better, and I have a better relationship with myself and everything/everyone around me when I use headspace
title: This app is life changing

I think it would have been better if they just made the song 15 or 25 minutes long and then repeat and loop the track and give the user to pick a custom sleep timer instead of making the song 8 hours long.
title: Music uses up storage

review:
I absolutely love this app and try to use it everyday. Meditation through Headspace has helped me a lot with my own mental health and I have found a new appreciation for life. 

Their support team is always top notch. I had an issue with my account and couldn‚Äôt remember the email address I used. Two of their members went above and beyond for me.
title: Love it

review: I appreciate all of the meditations that I can get to even though I don‚Äôt have a membership, but I thought that membership was free for teacher?    I can‚Äôt see what I am writing so I hope it is grammatically correct!  Let me know if there is a way for teachers to sign up for free!  Thank you for what we can get from the sotw though!
title: Great Meditations!

review: I never write reviews, but this has been one of the most important apps I have ever used. Andy‚Äôs voice and explanations are clear, calming, and stress-reducing. They‚Äôve tried to stuff this app so full of features and content that they‚Äôve gotten WORSE at the core purpose of the app.

It is worth the subscription price - everything about the app is premium and beautiful, thank you!
title: Headspace Meditation App

title: Lifesaver app

title: 5 stars! Absolutely amazing!

I struggle with anxiety and depression, particularly depression. It has helped me fortify my mind and use joy to inoculate my mind. It‚Äôs a top to step outside of depressive thoughts and see the silly stories they tell.

review: This app is the best purchase I‚Äôve ever made, and continues to be year after year. title: This app CHANGED my life, FOREVER  grateful

review: Please change the home screen to its original design if it‚Äôs not broke don‚Äôt fix it!!! It looks like Moodnotes and way too bubbly cartoony... let‚Äôs go back to clean design. title: Great for beginners but then?

title: Great!

title: Good app but charged $100 to renew

review: I genuinely can‚Äôt praise this app enough. title: Awesome.

title: Thank you!

For example, if you click sleep at the bottom of your screen, there is only one free option out of probably 25-30 options. That I have found so far. Excellent options. I especially like that you can choose a male or female voice. The Sleep Casts are AWESOME! (Loche Dormant!!) This app is fantastic for these alone!!! But adding in all the other content.....wow. This app has done it right.

review:
If you had asked me a few years ago if I would meditate I would have said no. I enjoy the 20 minutes of peaceful calm I take every day.  It is particularly important now as
my job is even more stressful than normal with responding to COVID in addition to our normal medical work.  

Give Headspace a go even if you are not into meditating you might be pleasantly surprised by the benefits you will find with a bit more headspace.
title: Taking care of yourself

review: Headspace for me is life changing. Andy‚Äôs voice is so soothing and calming that even in my most anxious moments I am able to unwind and relax. title: Best meditation app

review: Signed up for headspace during the pandemic and it is the best! Their sleep meditation really helps my husband to sleep. I have used some of their meditation courses and those have helped too. Lastly they‚Äôve got some white noise (like Ocean time) that helps our baby sleep as well. Win win for all of us :)

review: This is a very good, well-produced product. The meditations are excellent and genuinely beneficial. I had no idea there was a child section when I purchased this, but now my seven-year-old daughter and I listen to a meditation for her every night before she drifts off. title: Extremely high quality

review: I‚Äôm so grateful for Headspace. My husband died in February 2020. Shortly after his death everything was shut down due to Covid-19.  I was grieving and the loneliness was unbearable.  I did the counseling course.  It helped me so much, Andy‚Äôs voice was like listening to a friend.  I‚Äôm still lonely and grieving but I‚Äôm looking forward to the future. Thank you Headspace.
title: Grateful for Headspace

review: Loved using Headspace for meditation as well as a sleep aid for months. I have noticed marked improvement in my stress and anxiety levels partially due to the resources on this app. That said, it‚Äôs clear that Andy and Headspace are choosing to sell themselves out to companies that have nothing to do with meditation. Music and workouts in a meditation app? What? Stay true to yourself. Eh, I guess it‚Äôs just business.
title: Great But...

review:
Headspace is more than a meditation app. It uses meditation to shift your thinking to be accepting, happier, calm. It teaches about living life in a lighter more curious way. 

It gets it all done with courses that are usually 10 sessions long. Usually meditations are 10 minutes in the courses but there are also daily ones that can be as short as 3 minutes. You get to choose how long you meditate and what area you want to focus on.

If you are on the fence, try the trial, that is what I did. I liked it so much I thought it was worth to pay for it.

I hope my review helps üòä
title: An app that can change your thinking.

review:
I love this app for many reasons. This helps me with stress and it is amazing. It‚Äôs in my routine wake up listen to this then so whatever then around lunch time I would listen to any other
one and lastly before I sleep. I probably use this app more then most apps on my phone. If you are reading this before downloading to look at the reviews I recommend to download it. Thank you for creating this wonderful app!
title: Great app

review: It really did make me calm when lm sad or mad. It helped me with my feelings and emotions that l had in my mind. Took away the bad stuff and a focused mind. title: Rainday Antiques

review: I‚Äôm new to meditation, but this app has been really helpful in getting my feet wet, and feeling comfortable with the idea that meditation is difficult sometimes. It‚Äôs been very informative, the instructors are great, and the focus seems to be on meditation through audible instruction rather than physical or visual interaction.
title: Beautiful design and delivery

review: Fantastic, guided meditation. Simplicity at its finest. Day 5 and I feel that lifelong, transformative meditation is possible. I‚Äôve got a long way to go, but I BELIEVE it now. That I simply can become practiced and calm and happier. As an artist, I love the colors and graphics. Realism would hinder the process. Please, keep adding content, as it is precious and appreciated. Namaste.
title: Worth every penny!

review:
Be with myself is the best gift I can learn in my life journey. I am grateful that along the road I am finding compassion and self compassion in spaces like this. Feeling grateful for my life and for the free resources available for those who are struggling to find a way out. Thank you all who dedicates your knowledge and love through HeadSpace to the world. 
By Juliane K.
title: Drops of love

review: I‚Äôm a huge fan of Headspace. I love how easy it is to get started with a new course after you‚Äôve been gone for a while. I appreciate that they keep me motivated by showing me stats such as the number of minutes I‚Äôve meditated or the number of days in a row that I‚Äôve meditated.
title: Engaging and easy to use!

review: This app saved my life. As a provider working in covid, I never have time to see a therapist but these little 5 minute meditations have helped me stay healthy and sane! I am so grateful they gave it for free to health care providers, but even if I had to pay it would be worth what it has given back to me!

Thank you Andy and all the HEADSPACE crew!!!
title: Great introduction to meditation

title: This app is beyond worth it.

review: I love this app! Lots of courses to target issues that may be clouding your mind. I used this everyday for a short 10 minutes and found it tremendously helpful. Things that used to bother me, just roll off my back now. Download it and don‚Äôt look back!
title: Don‚Äôt look back

review: This app is such an incredible tool for those uninitiated to meditation. So many amazing guides and different focus points I can‚Äôt speak highly enough. Use it every day.

review: Everyone has something they use to decompress and relax after a long day. I‚Äôve been trying to use meditation as my decompressor and it‚Äôs been tremendously helpful. Highly recommend every try it every day for 30 days before saying meditation isn‚Äôt for you!
title: Life Changing

review:
Love this App. Worth every cent.
Beggars can‚Äôt be choosers. This is a phenomenal service and I can‚Äôt believe such entitled losers think everything needs to be free to them. How? Just how? The Sleepcast voice narrators need paid...along with whoever else.

I want to make a request. Please bring Kieron (narrated Loch Dormant) back to narrate more!! Love, love, love his voice and maybe his accent!! Haha.
title: Perfect

review: The guided meditation exercises help to eep you motivated and address a lot of questions that‚Äôll come up when you begin learning. The focus music, sleepover sounds, and more keep me on this app often. It‚Äôs worth a go if you‚Äôre interested in meditation...or creating more headspace ;)

review: This app/discipline can be life-changing if you allow it to be. I do now find it difficult to meditate without it (having to think about when to transition my thoughts). However, when I have it, I find it calming and instrumental in getting me to focus on the beauty of the moment.
title: Life changing

review:
Andy is the Best! If you‚Äôre looking for guided meditation, this app has it all. Right now I‚Äôm on my way to my goal of the 365 challenge.  One year of daily meditation! I‚Äôm at 40+ days and already can see and feel a better me! 
This is the best app for people of all ages in all different stages of their practice üíö
title: Can‚Äôt Say Enough!!

review: I love this app. I struggle with insomnia, anxiety and depressive tendencies, and as a almost 13 year old girl, it‚Äôs really hard. My insomnia gets worse and so does my tendencies, and since getting this app, I feel like I‚Äôm getting better ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π And that thought just really comforts me. Thank you, Headspace, for making this app a reality. üëèüèº
title: Awesome! üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº

review: Mindfulness and meditation are scientifically proven practices to manage struggles with mental health. Thanks to Headspace I have an easy, approachable way to find deeper joy in life.
title: Headspace changed my life

They started by removing the meditations, then only showed the peaceful videos once a week, and now it seems they‚Äôve removed the breathing exercises. review: I actually love the app, the variety of mediations and actually workouts (!) is fascinating. I‚Äôm just asking for correcting a problem for iOS (specifically for iPhone 6x). The menu at the bottom is a little cut and it‚Äôs hard to see what the icon is. Can you please fix this?

For an app that is supposed to help people be less anxious, mindful, and calm, this achieves quite the opposite. I get enough notifications from other things already, so the last thing I need is a meditation app causing me more anxiety. I will stick to using Calm instead.

review: Many mornings I don‚Äôt feel inspired to meditate but I put on a Headspace meditation and immediately feel a change come over me. I don‚Äôt know what I‚Äôd do without Headspace. :-)
title: Best guided meditation ever!

review: Headspace allows you to center yourself and think about the moment. In these troubling times, it is a way to calm down and think about yourself. And if you‚Äôve never meditated before, don‚Äôt worry, because headspace has free beginner courses. I use it without a subscription, and I am very pleased.
title: It works!

review: It‚Äôs an awesome app but I wish there was more things I could do with out buying the full version of the app I‚Äôm not going to spend money every month when there are other apps out there that are free but I really love that you say that it isn‚Äôt to clear the mind it is to recognize the thoughts going through the mind

review: I was surprised to see how much headspace made available for free during this time.  headspace has made a big difference in how I am coping personally and professionally. I have recommended this app to every friend who mentions how they want to get started in meditating.  I would have given up if I didn‚Äôt have such a simple and colorful guide like this.

Even the design of the app is so calming.  I love it.

review: I really love the recent changes including the Today design/experience and dark background! There may be a couple bugs in setting up the meditation and bedtime reminders from the dark mode switch. But the design journey is delightfully comforting overall.

review:
Love love love headspace!

2 enhancements would make this the best app!

2. It would be nice to start with a sleep cast followed by all night of sleepy music.  It‚Äôs either one or the other.

review: I love this app. I use it for sleeping and it really helps! There aren't any bugs, and the sleep casts and sleep music are amazing! Ok, I‚Äôll say! Headspace is a pretty good relaxation app. It‚Äôs calming, and does help you relax. But 99% of the app requires in-app purchases. I don‚Äôt like that. I got the app last month and deleted it today. I want to listen to sleep time music, I have to pay. I want to take a calming class, I have to pay. Overall, very relaxing. 

I don‚Äôt like that you have to pay for 99% of the app though. That‚Äôs not very nice. 

Please fix that.
title: Pretty Good, but...

After a year of membership I find this App to be my favorite. There are a number of options to experience and my sleep patterns have improved!

review: This is a perfect introduction to meditation in an easy to follow format. The experience using it is clear and simple. title: Headspace

title: Headspace

review: The quality of this application is beyond anything I have ever tried. It is remarkable the amount of thought and work put into this app. This will definitely help me when I am not feeling all that great and already has. Definitely would recommend.
title: Amazing

You‚Äôll know pretty early on if it‚Äôs for you or not. Regardless, good luck on your journey.

review:
From the variety of meditation experiences and courses to the focus music and daily offerings to the sleepcasts.- this is the whole package! The best thing is the beautiful energy that comes through in every aspect. You know this group, the creators if this app and content truly care. 
.
title: I Love Everything About This App

review: I have tried a couple of meditation apps, but headspace of by far my favorite. Simple, clear, fun and engaging it‚Äôs such an important tool. I have all my clients get headspace, because it‚Äôs such an important part of their practice. Change your thinking and you can change your life.

review: i‚Äôve recently started using this app again with its new features and i am amazed by it. it truly has helped me relax and refocus my mind. i cant sleep without it ! although, i do wish not everything on there you had to buy the subscription

review:
Have used the Headspace app for a year and a half and I feel its a fantastic app for beginners. It has a very progressive slope which can help one ramp up their meditation practice.
The only con I feel is it does not incentivize the user to meditate regularly, which could help the user be more regular with their practice.

review: I never knew how to go about starting meditation. title: Meh

review: Buyer beware- no refunds! They don't care about helping you. They only care about helping themselves to your money. Just another profit making scheme under the guise of "I want to help people." As long as you know their motivations are NOT about your happiness, love, and wagging puppy tails but instead all about getting your money, go ahead and pay for this product that is inferior to the FREE stuff you can find elsewhere. This is just a bunch of repeated blathering spliced together in different orders.
title: In it just for the money

Headspace is a lifesaver, and I‚Äôd be lost without having headspace.
title: Headspace

I assumed (reasonably I think) that if I was ineligible for a free trial, the app would have told me that and wouldn‚Äôt have repeatedly advertised one to me. Like I said, the button I pressed literally said ‚ÄúTry Free.‚Äù Pretty bad start to a business relationship for an app to explicitly tell me I‚Äôm not going to be charged and then to immediately charge me $70.

review: Headspace truly changed the way I think about meditation - therefore, has changed my life. It made a practice that I was struggling to get into easier. I was actually was able to sit in a non-judgements space with myself and WANT to meditate everyday. I recommend headspace to all my fitness clients.
title: Game changer

Logged several help desk messages trying to get it to restore and low and behold, double charged my Apple account but still would let me log in! Ended up disputing with my credit card company and going with another app. Too bad but who has the time for this?!! No thanks!

title: Great app. Needs planning/save feature.

review:

It says that they‚Äôre ‚Äúlocked‚Äù I thought maybe it was because I hadn‚Äôt finished all the meditations but when they were all completed I clicked on the ‚Äúlocked‚Äù meditation and it offered the ‚Äúfree trial.‚Äù I can basically only do three meditations out of the whole library and have to pay for everything else. review: This helps so much because school is always so stressful because so many assignments about things I didn‚Äôt even learn yet. Because of this I was able to throw my stress in the trash and be able to do more things without being stressed.

review:
I have been using headspace for more than 8 years now. Great investment especially they keep updating the app with different modules/ courses which fits everyone.

review:
My first few meditation sessions went well... except for intrusive thoughts of ‚Äúthis isn‚Äôt my idea of being productive!‚Äù
And ironically I begin to understand *that‚Äôs* the point: remove yourself from the ‚Äòproductive‚Äô world; move yourself mentally and physically inward, away from involvement with the outside world. Say ‚Äòhello‚Äô to yourself, ‚Äúhow are ya‚Äô doing in there?‚Äù
And listen for the answer.

review: I have subscribed to the family plan, I have used this off and on for the last couple years and it has really helped me during my most stressful moments. The body AND the mind need excersize and rest. I encourage you to give this a try. Remember, there is a blue sky above the clouds!

review: I wanted to learn more about meditation, but didn‚Äôt know where to begin. This app is a great place to start. I am working through the beginners course, which makes it easy to start forming a daily habit. I have noticed a huge difference in just a few days!

review: I love this app but I wish you could stack / make a playlist. For example, I like to listen to a 5 or 10 minute wind down before listening to a sleep cast. It would be nice to have a playlist to just hit play and be guided off to sleep.
title: I wish you could stack

review: The thing about this app that I really can't handle is the voices they use for the meditations and sleep casts. They are not at all soothing and many of them have this weird gargle-y scratchy tone in their voice that makes me want to scream and cry at the same time. Working for the horrible corporation of Starbucks gives me this app for free though, so I'll use it until I can't handle working for one of corporate America's demons any longer.
title: Good concept, horrible voices

review: This app has been super helpful! I‚Äôd love if there was more content supporting the working mom. How to balance work stress and kids, and meditations to help relax from work stress while pumping, and other issues working moms struggle with.

review: I never rate apps, but in a particularly difficult time of life, I tried my first meditation and I had an almost spiritual experience with one of the meditations. I felt empowered and free and lifted out of my burdens. I‚Äôm sold. I subscribed immediately. I can‚Äôt wait to meditate every day in the future.
title: Amazing first experience

review: I was surprised to see how much content is on here. There‚Äôs sessions for everything from stress management to working out to sleep. It‚Äôs easy to get in a few minutes every day to get yourself grounded. I enjoy the sleepcasts. I turn one on and I‚Äôm out in minutes.

review: Since I started using this app a week ago, my anxiety levels are lower and I feel more in control. I highly recommend this app. It‚Äôs great for mindfulness and it has enough free stuff, you don‚Äôt have to pay for it unless you want to.
title: Less anxiety

review: I am so grateful to the headspace team for creating this app. I feel lucky to have found it because it has helped me find clarity in my life like nothing else has. I highly recommend this mediation app to anyone looking to start their practice or find more consistency‚Äô.

review: As we go through life, we learn it contains intermittent chaos. But through the ups and downs, the gains and losses, I can always turn to Headspace as a stable, loving, caring practice. review:
The meditation and  information that Andy shares with me is making  a big difference in my emotional life and in turn for those I live and interact with ...especially with my husband. We have never been happier or kinder to each other.
Thanks you!
Maripat Monterubio
title: Anxiety Level One & Two

I‚Äôve been doing yoga and meditations for 20 years before my husband mention this app. I love it. All the programs they have are useful during many stages and situations of our lives. It brought my meditation practice to another level. 
Try it. You won‚Äôt retreat it.

review:
This is how anxious I am that when I noticed the ‚Äúmanaging anxiety‚Äù course was free, but expired soon, I tried to cram as much of the 30-day session in a couple days. review: This app is straightforward; it is relatable; it presents meditation in a helpful, real world way. Having this app at my disposal has given me a chance to focus and reflect on my time. I have even been able to introduce my 6 year old to the benefits of meditation.
title: It‚Äôs there when I need it.

review: I‚Äôve been with Headspace for three years now and feel like I have my own relationship with the teacher. He is very calm, kind, relatable, and even funny at times! I love the app and that they‚Äôve introduced a female voice for the sessions as well; she is just as great. (:

review: I have the deepest gratitude for Headspace and the people who have worked so hard to create something so beautiful, accesible, simple, and life-changing. The way this app is designed should win an award or something. Thank you so much Headspace. I am forever grateful.
